channel.title: CI/CD on Simon Gilbert Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CI/CD on Simon Gilbert Blog

item.title: Deploying C# Asp.Net Core to an Azure App Service via GitHub Actions using a deploy.yml File
item.description: Keen to understand how to deploy your C# Asp.Net Core application an an Azure App Service using GitHub Actions Continuous Integration (CI/CD)? Today we’ll discuss exactly how to do just that!

item.title: Continuous Integration (CI/CD) for a Typescript Serverless Lambda API using CircleCI
item.description: Are you getting tired of manually deploying your code to AWS after each code change? Today we’re going to implement Continuous Integration for Serverless Lambda, to automate our deployments using a CI/CD pipeline, based on the Git branch we push the commit to!

item.title: xUnit "Test Driven" Continuous Integration to Microsoft Azure Web App Services using Appveyor - C# ASP.Net MVC Core
item.description: Continuously deploying via Appveyor CI? Simon Gilbert explains only deploying an Azure Web App Service if all your xUnit tests pass in ASP.Net MVC Core

item.title: Continuous Integration for Azure Web App Service Deployments using Appveyor - C# ASP.Net MVC Core
item.description: Deploying Microsoft Azure Web App Services? Simon Gilbert explains continuous integration to the Azure Cloud, using YAML, Appveyor and C# ASP.Net MVC Core.
